>From: "javainsel" <javainsel@...>  
[snip]
>Is there a coverage measure which covers 100%?
>
>And is there a ranking of coverage measures in terms of how much 
>they cover compared to the other measures?

Sure, Paul Johnson wrote up some information on that: 
http://homepage.hispeed.ch/pjcj/testing_and_code_coverage/paper.html

Specifically: 
http://homepage.hispeed.ch/pjcj/testing_and_code_coverage/paper.html#what_covera
ge_metrics_to_use_and_what_percentages_to_aim_for

There's lots of stuff out there relevant to your questions (accessible via 
Google), in lots of professional journals, and books on testing (e.g., any of 
Boris Beizer's books).

Y'know?

Scott Stirling
Framingham, MA
